title: B-Daman.Crossfire.S01E18.720p.WEBRip.AAC2.0.H.264
description:
B-Daman Crossfire - Season 1 - Episode 18 (WEBRip - 720p)
---------------------------------------------------------

Riki Ryugasaki, a schoolboy who lives in the town of East City in the year 20XX,
can be a bit of an airhead at times, has a lively personality and dreams of being
an adventurer when he grows up. When a friend and classmate named Sumi Inaba takes
him to a B-Daman event, Riki's interest is sparked. His curiosity deepens when he
hears an urban legend about a secret B-Daman tournament that is open only to a
select group of players. While Riki remains a bit skeptical, he cannot resist
the urge to investigate the mystery behind B-Daman.

Produced by TV Tokyo and d-rights.

 <a href="
http://imageshack.us/a/img689/6192/f4ow.png" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://imageshack.us/a/img689/6192/f4ow.png</a>

The heavy damage Dracyan took in the last battle is repaired, but he has
lost all memory about himself and everyone else. Riki gets a mysterious
message from Novu telling him to come to some ruins in North City if he
wants help getting Dracyan's memory back. Though it may be a trap, Riki
decides to go and Samuru, Sumi, Rudy, and Asuka end up tagging along.
